description: Vardag means weekday in Swedish, and this sweater has everything you’re looking for in an everyday favourite. Timeless design with a round neck, ribbed cuffs and hem and a classic Fjällräven logo on the chest. Made in comfortable organic cotton jersey with a loop-knitted inside, perfect to accompany you both in town and on weekend outings.
name: Fjallraven Vardag Sweater - Mens
